summary: "Batman" (1989) is a superhero movie about the DC Comics character. Directed by Tim Burton, it stars Michael Keaton as Batman and Jack Nicholson as the Joker. The film shows Batman's early fight against crime and his clash with his greatest enemy, the Joker. It was a big success, making over $400 million. People loved the performances, direction, and design. Keaton's casting was surprising, but he proved he could play a serious role. The movie led to three sequels and a popular animated series.
title: Batman (1989 film)
